name: Movie Taglines Quiz for Experts | Movie Taglines

questions.text: 'They're not there to shop. They're not there to work. They're just there.'
questions.explanation:
Mallrats.

	Starring Jason Lee, Jeremy London, Shannen Doherty, Claire Forlani, and Joey Lauren Adams.

questions.text: 'The most beautiful love story ever told.'
questions.correct: Beauty And The Beast & Beauty and the Beast
questions.explanation:
Beauty And The Beast & Beauty and the Beast.

	Featuring the voices of Paige O'Hara, Robby Benson, Jerry Orbach, and Angela Lansbury.

Election.

	Starring Matthew Broderick, Reese Witherspoon, and Chris Klein.

questions.text: 'It's not who you love. It's how.'
questions.explanation:
Chasing Amy.

	Starring Ben Affleck, Joey Lauren Adams, and Jason Lee.

The Craft.

	Starring Robin Tunney, Fairuza Balk, and Neve Campbell.

Interview With The Vampire.

	Starring Tom Cruise, Brad Pitt, Antonio Banderas, and Kirsten Dunst.

questions.text: 'True love has never been a snap.'
questions.explanation:
The Princess Bride & Princess Bride.

	Starring Cary Elwes, Robin Wright, Chris Sarandon, Mandy Patinkin, and Andre the Giant.

Hook.

	Starring Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Maggie Smith, and Julia Roberts.

questions.text: 'A Hollywood producer. A Washington spin-doctor. When they get together, they can make you believe anything.'
questions.explanation:
Wag The Dog.

	Starring Robert DeNiro and Dustin Hoffman.

Runaway Bride.

	Starring Julia Roberts, Richard Gere, and Joan Cusack.

questions.text: 'Before the Internet, before cell phones, before roller-blades, there was a time...1985. Don't pretend you don't remember it.'
questions.explanation:
The Wedding Singer & Wedding Singer.

	Starring Adam Sandler and Drew Barrymore.

questions.text: 'Yesterday they were businessmen. Today they're cowboys. Tomorrow they'll be walking funny.'
questions.explanation:
City Slickers.

	Starring Billy Crystal, Bruno Kirby, and Daniel Stern.

questions.text: 'Can two friends sleep together and stll love each other in the morning?'
questions.explanation:
When Harry Met Sally.

	Starring Billy Crystal, Meg Ryan, Bruno Kirby, and Carrie Fisher.

Coyote Ugly.

	Starring Piper Perabo, Maria Bello, Tyra Banks, and Bridget Moynahan.

questions.text: 'Nothing is as simple as black and white.'
questions.explanation:
Pleasantville.

	Starring Reese Witherspoon, Tobey Maguire, William H. Macy, Joan Allen, and Jeff Daniels.
